mapper.select: select ib.board_id as boardId, ib.user_id as userId, ib.creation_id as creationId, ib.created_at as createdAt, ib.view_count as viewCount, ib.content as content, igd.image_url as imageUrl from image_board ib left join image_generation_data igd ON ib.creation_id = igd.creation_id order by board_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_comments (board_id, user_id, content) values (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.delete: delete from board_comments where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId}
